Available Books Action
{{ book.bookName }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { UserServiceService } from '../services/user-service.service'; import { UserStoreService } from '../services/user-store.service'; import { GroupService } from '../services/group.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-dashboard', templateUrl: './dashboard.component.html', styleUrls: ['./dashboard.component.css'] }) export class DashboardComponent implements OnInit{ myGroups:any constructor(private userService:UserServiceService,private userStoreService:UserStoreService,private groupService:GroupService){} ngOnInit(): void { const email=this.userService.getEmailFromToken(); this.userStoreService.setEmailToStore(email); this.groupService.getMyGroups().subscribe((res)=>{ console.log(res); this.myGroups=res; },(error)=>{ console.log(error); }) } }
